properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR ((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM_DD') END CREATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO)COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = REAT_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
